name: mui-country-code-selector-monorepo
description: A monorepo for the MUI Country Code Selector and its demo page
author: Jari Ikonen

scripts.lint: npm run lint -w mui-country-code-selector && npm run lint -w demo-page
scripts.ci-and-build: npm ci -ws false && npm run ci-and-build -w mui-country-code-selector && npm run ci-and-build -w demo-page
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf ./node_modules && npm run cleanup -w demo-page && npm run cleanup -w mui-country-code-selector
scripts.cleanup-ci-build-and-test: npm run cleanup && npm run ci-and-build && npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.rebuild-documentation: npm run build -w mui-country-code-selector && npm run create-docs -w mui-country-code-selector && npm run cleanup -w demo-page && npm run install-and-build -w demo-page
